lead_paragraph: Derek Anderson, the 24-year-old Cleveland quarterback who stepped in as the starter after the first game and led the Browns to a 10-6 record last season, was tendered a one-year offer for $2.5 million. But Browns General Manager Phil Savage said that if Anderson receives a better offer, Cleveland would probably not match it.
